Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute at 18th/Blue Island
ShortDescription: 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Ashland, Cermak, Loomis and 16th: due to, street blockage near 18th/Blue Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Ashland, Cermak, Loomis and 16th: due to, street blockage near 18th/Blue Island.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute near Division/Wells
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses rerouted EB: Division, LaSalle, Maple and D'brn; WB: Walton, Clark, Oak, LaSalle and Division: due to, street blockage near Division/Wells.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Division/Wells.

Eastbound buses will operate via Division, LaSalle, Maple and Dearborn.

Westbound buses will operate via Walton, Clark, LaSalle and Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound trains bypassing 79th
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 79th due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 79th due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
